title: Episode #7: Social Media and the Mind Part 2
description: Part 2 of my series on social media and the mind. In this episode I continue the discussion on the effects of social media on the mind and how to use social media to our benefit.
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
itunes:summary: Part 2 of my series on social media and the mind. In this episode I continue the discussion on the effects of social media on the mind and how to use social media to our benefit.
